resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106557</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106557</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grammar Scramblers, Spreadsheets, and Parts of Speech</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik-Verwürfelungsvorrichtungen, 
Kalkulationstabellen und Wortklassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brouilleurs, tableurs, et parties du discours de 
grammaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Scramblers, spreadsheets, e peças da gramática 
do discurso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dispositivi usati per disturbare, fogli 
elettronici e parti del discorso di grammatica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλογικές συσκευές κρυπτοφώνησης, υπολογισμοί με 
λογιστικό φύλλο (spreadsheet), και μέρη του λόγου γραμματικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desmoduladores, hojas de balance, y partes del 
discurso de la gramática</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students use and create Grammar Scramblers with a spreadsheet in order to practice identifying and using parts of speech in a fun way.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer benutzen und stellen 
Grammatik-Verwürfelungsvorrichtungen mit einer Kalkulationstabelle 
her, um Wortklassen, in einer Spaßmethode zu kennzeichnen und zu 
verwenden zu üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants utilisent et créent des 
brouilleurs de grammaire avec un tableur afin de pratiquer identifier 
et utiliser des parties du discours d'une voie d'amusement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes usam e críam scramblers da 
gramática com um spreadsheet a fim praticar identificar e usar partes
do discurso em uma maneira do divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi utilizzano e creano i dispositivi 
usati per disturbare di grammatica con un foglio elettronico per 
esercitarsi in identificare ed usando le parti del discorso in un modo
di divertimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές χρησιμοποιούν και δημιουργούν τις 
αναλογικές συσκευές κρυπτοφώνησης γραμματικής με έναν υπολογισμό
με λογιστικό φύλλο (spreadsheet) προκειμένου να ασκήσουν και τα
μέρη του λόγου με έναν τρόπο διασκέδασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes utilizan y crean los 
desmoduladores de la gramática con una hoja de balance para practicar
el identificar y el usar de partes del discurso de una manera de la 
diversión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>

            <entry>1770202544</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106557</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/grammar-scramblers-spreadsheets-and-parts-of-speech</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
